fields.description:
Test steps:
1. KitchenSink> Menu (Android)> Menu Handlers (Window Options)
2. Press Open Window
3. Press Menu (title bar on a tablet/ tool bar on a phone)


After step 3: Close button is out of the view
fields.summary: Android: Menu (Android) - Menu Handlers (Window Options) - Close button is outside  the view
